title: Who attended Jennifer Lawrence’s wedding to Cooke Maroney?
text:
The loved up couple tied the knot this weekend (Picture: Rex Features)

The bachelorette party might’ve been a bust, but the wedding sure made up for it.

Jennifer Lawrence’s wedding to Cooke Maroney was a night so glamorous it could rival the Oscars itself.

Who was there to watch Jennifer Lawrence marry ‘the best person she’s ever met?’

Something borrowed, Someone like you… (Picture: WireImage)

Adele

Adele and J-Law might seem like an unlikely duo, but the Tottenham singer and the Hollywood actress have been friends for years.

Here’s hoping this night ended a little differently than the last time Jennifer Lawrence and Adele had a night out.

Ashley Olsen and boyfriend Louis Eisner made for a stylish couple (Picture: Backgrid)

Ashley Olsen

Ashley Olsen was minus one Mary-Kate but plus boyfriend Louis Eisner, the child-star-turned-fashion-designer was there for the big day.

Funny girl Schumer might’ve been on hand to spice up the wedding toasts (Picture: Getty Images)

Amy Schumer

Advertisement

Advertisement

It looks like comedian Amy Schumer forgave Jennifer Lawrence for her (joke) tantrum after Schumer’s attention was taken away by her baby.

Cameron Diaz and Benji Madden helped J-Law celebrate (Picture: Getty Images)

Cameron Diaz and Benji Madden

One showbiz couple was on hand to celebrate the marriage of another, as Cameron Diaz and Good Charlotte guitarist Benji Madden attended the happy day.

Nicole Richie was also among celebrants (Picture: Backgrid)

Nicole Richie and Joel Madden

They made it a family affair, as brother Joel Madden was there with his wife, Nicole Richie.

Richie was spotted out and about the day before in the small town where the wedding was taking place.

Emma Stone went for a classic look (Picture: Backgrid)

Emma Stone

Fellow Oscar-winning actress Emma Stone was on-hand to celebrate the big day.

Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble spotted at the shindig (Picture: SplashNews.com)

Kris Jenner

Momager extraordinaire Kris wouldn’t miss ‘BFF’ J-Law’s nuptials – especially after the actress gave her a Porsche for Christmas… sort of.

Lady in red Sienna Miller (Picture: Backgrid)

Sienna Miller

37-year-old Sienna Miller stunned in a red gown as she was snapped at the wedding.

She was with her toyboy beau, 28-year-old Lucas Zwirner.

MORE: Adele, Kris Jenner and more arrive ahead of Jennifer Lawrence’s star-studded wedding in Rhode Island

MORE: Piers Morgan ridicules Jennifer Lawrence over ‘tacky’ wedding registry wish-list on Amazon

MORE: Jennifer Lawrence set to marry Cooke Maroney on Saturday as wedding details revealed
description: Who were some of the famous faces celebrating Jennifer Lawrence's wedding to Cooke Maroney?
